events.message: Customer reported a collision involving their car with another vehicle at a busy intersection causing moderate damage.
Claim was categorized under Auto Accident after review of initial incident details and keywords indicating a vehicle collision.
A claims agent was assigned to handle the case, ensuring proper follow-up and guidance for the customer throughout the process.
Customer notified that their claim has been officially acknowledged and the investigation process will commence shortly.
Request sent to customer for submitting accident report, vehicle photos, and police report to support the claim evaluation.
Customer provided the requested documents promptly, including detailed photos of vehicle damage and the official police report.
Claims investigation initiated by the assigned agent, reviewing submitted evidence and contacting involved parties.
Investigation concluded confirming liability and extent of damages consistent with the customerâ€™s account and documentation.
A settlement offer was proposed to the customer based on repair estimates and insurance policy coverage limits.
Customer responded positively to the proposed settlement and requested to proceed with the payment process.
Claim officially approved after agreement on settlement terms, clearing the way for payment issuance.
Payment was issued to the customer for vehicle repair costs as per the agreed settlement amount.
The claim case was closed successfully following payment and customer confirmation of satisfaction with the process.
All claim documents and records have been archived securely for future reference and compliance with company policy.
